author: Gino Spocchia, Gino Spocchia
title: Hydroxychloroquine: Is Trump's controversial drug really a game-changer in fight against coronavirus?
description: Studies have not concluded the anti-malarial drug can beat coronavirus, but Donald Trump continues to promote it
content:
When Donald Trump doubled down on the benefits of hydroxychloroquine at the White House this weekend, the US president continued down the well-trodden path of wishing for a wonder cure to the coronavirus pandemic.
Itll be wonderful, itll be so beautiful. Itl… [+8199 chars]
